# quantity(_:)

**Type Method**

Indicates the quantity of items the customer is purchasing.

## Declaration

```swift
static func quantity(_ quantity: Int) -> Product.PurchaseOption
```

## Parameters

- **quantity**: The number of items the customer is purchasing.

The default value is 1. The maximum value is 10.

## Return Value

An instance of [doc://com.apple.storekit/documentation/StoreKit/Product/PurchaseOption] to use in [doc://com.apple.storekit/documentation/StoreKit/Product/purchase(options:)].

## Discussion

The quantity applies to consumable in-app purchases and non-renewing subscriptions.

## Setting the purchase options

- **appAccountToken(_:)**: Sets a UUID to associate the purchase with an account in your system.
- **winBackOffer(_:)**: Sets a win-back offer to apply to the purchase.
- **promotionalOffer(offerID:keyID:nonce:signature:timestamp:)**: Applies a promotional offer for an auto-renewable subscription.
